analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika hetu sampayutta duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetusampayutto
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭighaḥ na hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe a nidassana appaṭigha

original: hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na hetu sampayuttaḥ ca na anidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nahetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
